lineage.Process: Merge ecomag_basins;amur_basin_poly;ec_vdh;watershed_mor;garonne_basin C:\temp\ec_bas.shp "ID 'ID' true true false 8 Long 0 8 ,First,#,ecomag_basins,ID,-1,-1,amur_basin_poly,Id,-1,-1,ec_vdh,ID,-1,-1,watershed_mor,ID,-1,-1,garonne_basin,ID,-1,-1;AREA 'AREA' true true false 16 Double 3 15 ,First,#,ecomag_basins,AREA,-1,-1,amur_basin_poly,Area,-1,-1,ec_vdh,AREA,-1,-1;PERIMETER 'PERIMETER' true true false 16 Double 3 15 ,First,#,ecomag_basins,PERIMETER,-1,-1;NAME_BAS 'NAME_BAS' true true false 30 Text 0 0 ,First,#,ecomag_basins,NAME_BAS,-1,-1;en_name 'en_name' true true false 50 Text 0 0 ,First,#,ecomag_basins,en_name,-1,-1;name_rus 'name_rus' true true false 254 Text 0 0 ,First,#,ecomag_basins,name_rus,-1,-1,amur_basin_poly,name_rus,-1,-1,ec_vdh,name_rus,-1,-1,garonne_basin,name_rus,-1,-1;name_en 'name_en' true true false 254 Text 0 0 ,First,#,ecomag_basins,name_en,-1,-1,amur_basin_poly,name_en,-1,-1,ec_vdh,name_en,-1,-1,watershed_mor,name_en,-1,-1,garonne_basin,name_en,-1,-1;NAME 'NAME' true true false 120 Text 0 0 ,First,#,ec_vdh,NAME,-1,-1"
Dissolve ec_bas D:\maps\ecomag_basins.shp name_rus;name_en # MULTI_PART DISSOLVE_LINES

status.progress: REQUIRED: The state of the data set.
status.update: REQUIRED: The frequency with which changes and additions are made to the data set after the initial data set is completed.

bounding.westbc: REQUIRED: Western-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in longitude.

bounding.northbc: REQUIRED: Northern-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in latitude.
bounding.southbc: REQUIRED: Southern-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in latitude.
